source.description: nsert the source configuration for data mirrored from S3.

destination.description: Insert the destination configuration for time series data mirrored from S3.

subscriptions.description: Insert the time series subscriptions configuration for time series mirrored to S3.

data-modeling.description: Insert the data modeling configuration for syncing a data model to S3.

event.description: Enter the event configuration for mirroring events to S3.

raw-tables.description: Enter the raw tables configuration to mirror the raw tables to S3.
